videoDetails.Title: War Thunder New OST — Ground Forces
videoDetails.Description:
To commemorate the 10th anniversary of War Thunder and on the eve of the new year, we have prepared an extended War Thunder soundtrack for high-rank ground and air battles, which will also be available in the Apex Predators update. The soundtrack contains over 20 tracks and has a runtime of around one and a half hours. In addition to new compositions, old tracks have been remixed and remastered, and also include live drums for the Air Force soundtrack! The new War Thunder soundtrack will be available on streaming platforms in early 2023.

Original Game Soundtrack
Ground Forces Vol. 2

Credits:

Composed by: Jimmie Asche, Nikita Mokrov
Produced, mixed and mastered by: Pavel Stebakov

00:00 - Incoming
05:00 - Persistence Hunting
10:20 - Nigelcore
15:06 - Steel Rain
20:49 - New Power
26:46 - Scorched Earth
32:15 - Fields of Heroes
37:39 - The CAS Is On The Way
41:58 - Aftermath
46:59 - Victory will be ours
